GREETINGS:
Привіт. Вітаємо у ВступБоті. Оберіть мову спілкування, за умовчуванням вибрана українська. Щоб ознайомитись з командами введи /help

Hello, my dear friend. Choose language you prefer for communication, default is Ukrainian. Use /help to get more information about me
HELP: You can use /menu, not everything works, it's still in development. For questions contact with developer @VolondeBot
CONFIGURATION:
User configuration. Press button
 Examine - set your exam marks 
 Speciality - search your speciality. In development 
 Language - set language for telegram bot
CHOOSE_CAT: Choose searching method so You can get a list of specialities. Input specialities names in Ukrainian
CHOSEN_SPEC: Searching finished. I found such list of specialities. You can press button so You would get its identification code. This functionality still in development
